title.rendered: Video: Investigating WPForms email issues with clever developer tools: wp-cli, HELO, and Querious

content.rendered:
I recently had an issue with form notification emails not sending from a local development site. I used some advanced developer tools to diagnose this and thought the process was pretty interesting. So this is a tour of those tools and how I used them to solve this problem.

Tools are:

  • HELO (beta – get it when launches!)
  • WP-CLI
  • Querious (but you could use phpMyAdmin, TablePlus or SequelPro)

(Also on YouTube)
